GoH.utilities¶

GoH.utilities.create_spelling_dictionary(wordlists, directory)[source]¶

Compiles a spelling dictionary from one or multiple wordlist files. Returns results as a set.

Arguments: wordlists – List of filenames for the wordlist files. directory – Location of the wordlist files.

GoH.utilities.readfile(input_dir, filename)[source]¶

Reads in file from directory and file name. Returns the content of the file.

Arguments: input_dir – Directory containing the file. filename – Name of file to be read.

GoH.utilities.stats_to_df(corpus_statistics)[source]¶

Convert dictionary of corpus statistics to a dataframe for computations

Arguments: corpus_statistics –

GoH.utilities.strip_punct(text)[source]¶

Removes select punctuation marks and numbers from a text and replaces them with a space.

Non-permanent changes for evaluation purposes only.

Uses the re library.

Arguments: text – Content to be evaluated.

GoH.utilities.to_lower(tokens)[source]¶

Converts all tokens to lower case.

Arguments: tokens – List of tokens generated using a tokenizer

GoH.utilities.tokenize_text(text)[source]¶

Converts file content to a list of tokens.

Uses the NLTK Whitespace Tokenizer.

Arguments: text – Content to be tokenized.
